INSERT INTO ISSUE_HISTORY VALUES ('IH' || TO_CHAR(SEQ_IH_NO.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), 'I' || TO_CHAR(SEQ_IS.CURRVAL, 'FM000'), #{issueTitle}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT I.ISSUE_NO , P.PROJECT_NAME , W.WORK_NAME , I.ISSUE_TITLE , I.REGISTER_DATE , I.ISSUE_TYPE , M.MEMBER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME , IH.STATUS , M2.MEMBER_NAME AS TEAMWORKER_NAME , I.ACTION_DATE , IH.IH_DATE FROM ISSUE I JOIN PROJECT P ON (I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK) JOIN WORK W ON (I.WORK_NO = W.WORK_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (I.REGISTER_TYPE = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT ISSUE_NO, STATUS, IH_DATE FROM ISSUE_HISTORY WHERE (ISSUE_NO, IH_DATE) IN (SELECT ISSUE_NO, MAX(IH_DATE) FROM ISSUE_HISTORY GROUP BY ISSUE_NO)) IH ON (I.ISSUE_NO = IH.ISSUE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (I.TEAMWORKER = M2.MEMBER_NO) WHERE I.PROJECT_NO = #{pno} ORDER BY I.ISSUE_NO DESC

SELECT I.ISSUE_NO , I.PROJECT_NO , P.PROJECT_NAME , W.WORK_NAME , I.ISSUE_TITLE , I.ISSUE_CONTENT , I.REGISTER_DATE , I.ISSUE_TYPE , I.REGISTER_TYPE , M.MEMBER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME , IH.STATUS , I.TEAMWORKER , M2.MEMBER_NAME AS TEAMWORKER_NAME , I.ACTION_DATE , IH.IH_DATE , IH.IH_CONTENT FROM ISSUE I JOIN PROJECT P ON (I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK) JOIN WORK W ON (I.WORK_NO = W.WORK_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (I.REGISTER_TYPE = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT ISSUE_NO, STATUS, IH_DATE, IH_CONTENT FROM ISSUE_HISTORY WHERE (ISSUE_NO, IH_DATE) IN (SELECT ISSUE_NO, MAX(IH_DATE) FROM ISSUE_HISTORY GROUP BY ISSUE_NO)) IH ON (I.ISSUE_NO = IH.ISSUE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (I.TEAMWORKER = M2.MEMBER_NO) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y' AND I.ISSUE_NO = #{issueNo}

mapper.select: SELECT PT.TEAM_PK, PT.PROJECT_PK, PT.MEMBER_PK, PT.ROLE, P.PROJECT_NAME FROM PROJECT_TEAM PT JOIN PROJECT P ON (P.PROJECT_PK = PT.PROJECT_PK) WHERE PT.MEMBER_PK = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHANGE_REQUEST VALUES ('CR' || TO_CHAR(SEQ_CR.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), #{requestTitle}, #{requestContent}, SYSDATE, #{workNo}, #{workName}, #{status}, #{projectNo}, #{beginDate}, #{completeDate}, #{precedeNo}, #{completeRate}, #{grantorNo}, #{workLevel}, #{highWorkNo}, #{workType}, 'Y', #{memberNo}, DEFAULT, #{crGrantor1}, #{crGrantor2}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{registerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT CR.CHANGE_NO , CR.REQUEST_TITLE , CR.REQUEST_DATE , CR.WORK_NO , CR.WORK_NAME , CR.STATUS , CR.PROJECT_NO , P.PROJECT_NAME , CR.CR_GRANTOR_1 , M2.MEMBER_NAME AS GRANTOR_NAME_1 , CR.CR_GRANTOR_2 , M3.MEMBER_NAME AS GRANTOR_NAME_2 , CR.REGISTER_NO , M.MEMBER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME , CR.CR_STATUS FROM CHANGE_REQUEST CR JOIN PROJECT P ON (CR.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK) JOIN MEMBER M ON (CR.REGISTER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (CR.CR_GRANTOR_1 = M2.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M3 ON (CR.CR_GRANTOR_2 = M3.MEMBER_NO) WHERE CR.PROJECT_NO = #{pno} ORDER BY CR.CHANGE_NO DESC

SELECT CR.CHANGE_NO , CR.REQUEST_TITLE , CR.REQUEST_CONTENT , CR.REQUEST_DATE , CR.WORK_NO , CR.WORK_NAME , CR.STATUS , CR.PROJECT_NO , P.PROJECT_NAME , CR.BEGIN_DATE , CR.COMPLETE_DATE , CR.PRECEDE_NO , CR.COMPLETE_RATE , CR.GRANTOR_NO , M4.MEMBER_NAME AS WORK_GRANTOR_NAME , CR.WORK_LEVEL , CR.HIGH_WORK_NO , W.WORK_NAME AS HIGH_WORK_NAME , CR.WORK_TYPE , CR.WORK_STATUS , CR.MEMBER_NO , M5.MEMBER_NAME AS WORK_MEMBER_NAME , CR.CR_GRANTOR_1 , M2.MEMBER_NAME AS GRANTOR_NAME_1 , CR.CR_GRANTOR_2 , M3.MEMBER_NAME AS GRANTOR_NAME_2 , CR.REGISTER_NO , M.MEMBER_NAME AS REGISTER_NAME , CR.CR_STATUS FROM CHANGE_REQUEST CR JOIN PROJECT P ON (CR.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK) JOIN MEMBER M ON (CR.REGISTER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (CR.CR_GRANTOR_1 = M2.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M3 ON (CR.CR_GRANTOR_2 = M3.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M4 ON (CR.GRANTOR_NO = M4.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M5 ON (CR.MEMBER_NO = M5.MEMBER_NO) JOIN WORK W ON (CR.HIGH_WORK_NO = W.WORK_NO) WHERE CR.CHANGE_NO = #{changeNo}
SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPT D ON (M.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) JOIN RANK R ON (M.RANK_NO = R.RANK_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{grantorNo}

SELECT W.WORK_NO , W.WORK_NAME , W.STATUS , W.PROJECT_NO , P.PROJECT_NAME , W.BEGIN_DATE , W.COMPLETE_DATE , W.PRECEDE_NO , W.COMPLETE_RATE , W.GRANTOR_NO , W.WORK_LEVEL , W.HIGH_WORK_NO , W2.WORK_NAME AS HIGH_WORK_NAME , W.WORK_TYPE , W.MEMBER_NO , W.WORK_STATUS FROM WORK W LEFT OUTER JOIN WORK W2 ON (W.HIGH_WORK_NO = W2.WORK_NO) JOIN PROJECT P ON (W.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK) WHERE W.WORK_NO = #{workNo}
